name: Sharp Air Conditioner
description: Sharp J Tech Inverter Air Conditioner AH XP18SHV is a perfect choice for you and your family with its cutting-edge features. This 1.5 ton AC with its cooling capacity of 2.0HP and 18000 BTU can be a perfect addition to your home or your office. This powerful AC has a cooling area of *140-170 square feet.

name: Xiaomi TV
description: The Xiaomi Mi P1 L32M6-6ARG Smart Android TV comes with a 32 inches HD (1,366 x 768) display. It has a viewing angle of 178°(H)/178°(V). The Mi P1 features a MediaTek MT9611 processor. It is equipped with Quad CA53, up to 1.2GHz CPU, and Mali 470 MP3 GPU. It has 1.5GB RAM and 8GB of storage.
